note.note-paragraph:
Group C01G23/002 is impacted by reclassification into group
C01G23/003.
Groups C01G23/002 and C01G23/003 should be considered in order to perform a complete search .

CPC-specific-text.text: Titanates

note.note-paragraph:
Group C01G23/003 is incomplete pending reclassification from group C01G23/002.
Groups C01G23/002 and C01G23/003 should be considered in order to perform a complete search .
